movies.title: Skyfall
movies.descripition: Bonds loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. When MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.

movies.title: First Man
movies.descripition: A look at the life of the astronaut, Neil Armstrong, and the legendary space mission that led him to become the first man to walk on the Moon on July 20, 1969.

movies.title: The Nun
movies.descripition: A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible II
movies.descripition: IMF Agent Ethan Hunt is sent to Sydney, to find and destroy a genetically modified disease called "Chimera"

movies.title: Venom
movies.descripition: When Eddie Brock acquires the powers of a symbiote, he will have to release his alter-ego "Venom" to save his life.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
movies.descripition: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.descripition: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: Spectre
movies.descripition: A cryptic message from 007 past sends him pitted against a mysterious terrorist organization called Spectre, and learns of its involvement in previous events of his most dangerous missions.

movies.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
movies.descripition: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team, along with some familiar allies, race against time after a mission gone wrong.

movies.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
movies.descripition: One year after Kevin McCallister was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself stranded in New York City - and the same criminals are not far behind.

movies.title: Avengers: Infinity War
movies.descripition: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

movies.title: Peppermint
movies.descripition: Five years after her husband and daughter are killed in a senseless act of violence, a woman comes back from self-imposed exile to seek revenge against those responsible and the system that let them go free.

movies.title: The Grinch
movies.descripition: On the outskirts of Whoville, there lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans on ruining the Christmas holiday for all of the citizens of the town.

movies.title: Captain America: Civil War
movies.descripition: Political involvement in the Avengers activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man.

movies.title: Ready Player One
movies.descripition: When the creator of a virtual reality world called the OASIS dies, he releases a video in which he challenges all OASIS users to find his Easter Egg, which will give the finder his fortune.

movies.title: Jerry Maguire
movies.descripition: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former secretary.

movies.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
movies.descripition: Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his reality and crosses paths with his counterparts from other dimensions to stop a threat to all reality.

movies.title: Casino Royale
movies.descripition: Armed with a license to kill, Secret Agent James Bond sets out on his first mission as 007, and must defeat a private banker to terrorists in a high stakes game of poker at Casino Royale, Montenegro, but things are not what they seem.
